products.title: Addict Soleil Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Influenced by watercolour, this hazy abstract design will bring an artistic touch to your window. The daubs of golden yellow give warmth to the contrasting grey hues, making this moody motif a stylish complement for modern interiors. The addict soleil roller blind will work well alongside greys with yellow or brown-beige undertones and accents of yellow and mustard. Product id: sdb-pfr0454 fabric colour: soleil material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes addict soleil perfect fit roller blind in grey/yellow.
